text:
Kevin J. McIntyre (December 27, 1960 – January 2, 2019) was an American attorney and government official. He was a member and Chairman of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) from 2017 to 2018 during the Donald Trump administration. He was co-leader of the global energy practice at the law firm Jones Day. He was born in an air force base near Dover, Delaware.
McIntyre died on January 2, 2019 from brain cancer in Arlington, Virginia at the age of 57.
